p.b: Common source context to rule attribute mapping

conbody.p: The given common source context attributes include a cross-section of Gy message command-level attributes and internally derived attributes. The subsequent blocks provide information on the attributes and triggers for a specific source context.

section.title: Common source context to rule attribute mapping
section.p: The given common source context attributes include a cross-section of Gy message command-level attributes and internally derived attributes. The subsequent blocks provide information on the attributes and triggers for a specific source context.
